branchCategory.name: C(D)Q2K-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Non-rotating
branchCategory.description: Standard double acting, non-rotating single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 63mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.
